section.description: Alpha Anywhere supports two different techniques for emailing an HTML report.

step.description: Display the Report tab of the Control Panel.
Select your report and click Preview.
When the report appears on your screen, click File > Send... . Picture
Select Dynamic HTML and click Send.

section.title: Background Operation
section.description: Alternatively, you can create a script that generates the report and emails it without user interaction. This script selects a single page from the Invoice report and saves it to file as "c:\test.htm". It then retrieves the file and inserts it into the message field of a new email. You could retrieve the email address and invoice selection criteria from a table and send out a series of invoices using this method.
section.example: dim message as C query.filter = "between(recno(),1,1)" query.order = "recno()" :Report.SaveAs("Invoice", "HTML", query.filter, query.order, "c:\test.htm", .F.) wait_until(.F., 5, 5) if file.exists("c:\test.htm") then message = file.to_string("c:\test.htm") end if email_send("address@somewhere.com", "HTML Message",message, "", "", "", .F., "HTML")
